extension.name: System - Administration Brand Remover Plugin
extension.author: emkt.mx
extension.description:
Remove all Administration Branding from your site, and gives it a different look.
For installation: Enable this plugin in Plugin Manager > Type System
For comments please contact us: http://emkt.mx/ku
